about.title: Passion for racing
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.paragraph1: Founded by passionate motorsport enthusiasts, our team has evolved from weekend racers to a professional racing organization with both real-world and virtual racing divisions.
about.paragraph2: With a dedicated crew of experienced drivers, engineers, and strategists, we provide extraordinary trackday experiences and competitive simracing teams that push the boundaries of what's possible.

teams.description: Auriga Racing is active across multiple disciplines, from real-world in Fun Cup events to serious simracing competitions

track.description: Our Fun Cup team competes in events across Europe, showcasing skill and precision in some of the most challenging circuits.

features.drivers: Professional drivers with years of experience

simracing.title: Simracing
simracing.description: Our Simracing division competes at a respectable level in virtual motorsports with serious engagement based on the principles and values ​​that build the team.
